item.description:
Come join us for an evening of Mah Jongg! Don't worry if you have never played before - I will teach the game, and then we'll play a few open hands first. We will be playing National Mah Jongg League rules.  

Damata's has a small parking lot in front on Bridge Street and additional parking to the side and behind the building. More spots are available on Ferry Street.

We request that when we hold Meetups in public establishments that everyone in attendance order at least one item or beverage.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the pink mah jongg case on the round table......

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Mah Jongg in Salem
